c\u00e9line2.name: Céline
c\u00e9line2.title: Blissful Tea Party
c\u00e9line2.description: Princess of Firene. Serves the ultimate tea that grants deep satisfaction to any who drink it. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: You don't have to use only the high-quality tea leaves. Any tea can be the best if it makes you happy.
Firene is the preeminent grower of tea. I once snuck out to a village there to see the tea fields for myself.
I love selecting flowers for the table. Like pretty peonies! Perhaps I should put out your favorite flowers today.
A legend says that tea in which lucky leaves float will cure any illness. How wonderful would it be if it were true?

I used to be quite skilled at guessing the origin of different teas when I tasted them.
I shall have to start from scratch and study up on the teas popular in Askr.
Visit: I would like to have tea with you next time, but today I bring you a greeting from [F].
Level: This makes me happy. A tea with a bright floral aroma would suit these sentiments perfectly.
I'm pleased with these results. Let us refresh with a fruity tea and continue awhile longer.
Shall I brew a calming herbal tea?
Summon: I am Céline. I feel truly blessed to be invited to a tea party in this world. If it pleases you, I will serve the tea.
Learn Skill: Thank you for treating me to this. It made for a fantastic tea party.
Confession:
Welcome, Summoner. I am delighted you made it today. I will start brewing your favorite tea right away.
Mmm, this aroma. From now on, I will recall this pleasant, relaxing time we spent together when I brew this tea.
In Firene, attending tea parties was an official duty, but those were rife with tense formality and subtle politics.
Enjoying this time with Heroes from other worlds, free of that rivalry, is an exceptionally rare treat for me.
Thank you. If I ever return to days of chaos and war, these memories will strengthen my heart to keep fighting.
Status: *giggle*
I changed clothes to serve as a tea party hostess... This outfit suits me, don't you agree?
Oh! It would be awful if I spilled the tea. Please be patient and partake of some confections.
You would like another cup? These tea leaves do have the most wonderful floral aroma.
I was always the one being served in Firene, but I actually longed to try being a server myself.
This is so delicious. I have outdone myself. *giggle* I must have one more taste, just to be sure, of course.
I remember indulging in tea parties often as a child. I had tea with my mother, my older brother, and...my father...
I hope you have fun today. I plan to fill your cup to the brim with heartwarming joy.

felix4.name: Felix
felix4.title: Savant's Service
felix4.description: Heir to House Fraldarius who fearlessly devotes himself to the way of the sword. How will he master his new role as tea-party server? Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Castle Hall: I must never allow Ingrid, the boar, or any of the others to see me wearing this... Especially not Sylvain...
If you have time for tea, go practice swordsmanship instead. That's how I live and how I plan to keep living.
I have to choose the right tea leaves for the tea... You appear to be idle. You can accompany me as I do so.
I prefer practical clothing. But, if the tea party requires this, I will merely note my objection for the record.
This tea set is of exceptional quality. Like a fine weapon, if it is handled with skill, its quality shines through.
Visit:
So you're the one who requested my exceptional tea service. This blend blew away [F].
Give it a taste.
Level: This is my signature brew. Go on, have a sip!
You'll never catch me serving tea at the wrong temperature.
What's with that dissatisfied scowl? Hold on! I'll pour you another cup!
Summon: I'm Felix, and today I'm serving as a waiter. If you want some of my tea, show me a resolve worthy of it.
Learn Skill: Hmph. I'm not sure what you hoped for, but I can thank you with this cup of hot tea.
Confession:
When talk of this server business reached me, I thought you had lost your mind.
Have you never heard the saying "find the right person for the job"?
My duty as a server began before I was convinced there was any point... but then I noticed something.
Above all, a server must focus on the needs of their customers. That's an expectation I can easily meet.
You must keep a watchful eye on all your customers and promptly assess their needs at any moment.
As in battle, you can't win by blindly swinging a sword. It's crucial to be able to read your foe's intentions.
While serving, I refined situational observation skills I can make use of as I follow the path of the sword.
Status: Mm...
You aren't familiar with the saying, "The right person for the right job," are you? I'll do what you ask, but...
Watch it! Can't you see I'm holding a tea set?!
If you have time to drown yourself in tea... Well, whatever. I'll keep my thoughts to myself.
Slacking off? Of course not. I am waiting for the tea pot to heat up.
No matter how many tea cakes I bring, they vanish immediately. I don't understand.
I have seen many kingdoms devastated by war. But this is different... Could this be what peace looks like?
You may drink the tea I've poured. I can't guarantee you'll enjoy the taste, though.

ingrid4.name: Ingrid
ingrid4.title: Cordial Teatime
ingrid4.description: Ingrid, daughter of Count Galatea, and Nanna, princess of House Nordion, fill the roles of servers with an air of relaxation. They appear in Fire Emblem: Three Houses / Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.
ingrid4.harmonized:
Grants "unit can move 1 extra space" to unit (that turn only; does not stack).
Grants【Resonance: Blades】and【Empathy】to unit and allies from the same titles as unit for 1 turn.
Once used, Harmonized Skill cannot be activated again right away. At start of every third turn, if Harmonized Skill has already been used, unit can use Harmonized Skill again.
(Harmonized Skills can be used by tapping the Harmonized button. Harmonized Skills cannot be used by units deployed using
Pair Up
.)
【Resonance: Blades】
Grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat for 1 turn.
【Empathy】
Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = number of types of【Bonus】effects, excluding stat bonuses, and【Penalty】effects, excluding stat penalties, active on player team and enemy team during combat (max 7).
【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).
【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).
ingrid4.voice: Brittany Cox + — Voice actor is uncredited in-game.

Castle Hall: **Ingrid:** What delicious looking tea treats! So colorful... And that sweet aroma... No! I need to wait on the customers first.
**Ingrid:** The time I spent sipping tea with the professor was precious to me. Those memories help support me now.
**Nanna:** Ingrid is so earnest about choosing sweets to pair with the tea. I would like to learn from her example.
**Ingrid:** Princess Nanna, that tea-server outfit looks adorable on you! Seeing you in it makes my heart happy.
**Nanna:** I would like to express my gratitude to those who have watched over me. Maybe I will repay them with this tea.
Visit: **Nanna:** I am Nanna of House Nordion. This invitation to tea was placed in my care by [F].
Level: **Nanna:** I will give those I love the gift of some extra special time.
**Ingrid:** I shall proceed along the path of being a bold and just server!
**Nanna:** I am sorry, it seems I got the blend of tea leaves all wrong...
Summon: Are you prepared, Princess Nanna? I am here to aid you. We shall do a grand job fulfilling the role of servers!
Learn Skill: **Ingrid:** What kind of tea party sweet is this?! Princess Nanna, um, m-may I try just one little bite? Please.
Confession:
**Ingrid:** Princess Nanna, as someone devoted to becoming a knight, I found the tale of Hoðr, the black knight, fascinating!
**Nanna:** If there is time, I have more stories of the legendary 12 crusaders to tell. Perhaps I could share them over tea?
**Ingrid:** Yes! I would be delighted to prepare the tea for that. I have learned so much about brewing and serving it.
**Nanna:** Oh? I would also like to brew tea for you sometime. I am more confident in my ability to prepare it now.
**Ingrid:** Well then, let us make some tea and take turns serving one another?
**Nanna:** Haha! That sounds like a lovely time, indeed. I look forward to tasting the tea you prepare for me, Ingrid.
Status: Hm?
"So many delicious looking sweets... No. Today, I am the server." "Um, Ingrid, are you all right?"
Conversation: **Ingrid:** This is delicious! Princess Nanna, you excel at making tea.
**Nanna:** Ah, it is nothing. I am used to serving tea to my father and Lord Leif.
**Ingrid:** Ah, that makes perfect sense. I heard that Lord Leif is a childhood friend of yours.
**Nanna:** Yes. We grew up around each other. He has always been kind.
He's also very enthusiastic about the art of combat and his studies. I have great respect for him.
**Ingrid:** Uh, he sounds wonderful, especially when compared to some of my childhood friends.
**Ingrid:** Not that much. There are many things I can respect them for now, but...
They could still benefit from some... self-improvement, and can be a lot to deal with at times.
**Nanna:** Oh dear. That must be difficult. At the same time, it sounds as if it could be entertaining.
**Ingrid:** Heh, I suppose it does keep things from getting boring.
**Nanna:** Will they also be attending the tea service today?
**Ingrid:** I believe they are coming. They can't pass up an opportunity to give me a hard time while I'm serving tea.
**Nanna:** I am looking forward to it. You must introduce me.
**Ingrid:** I will. Also, um... Before they arrive, would you be willing to teach me the proper way to brew tea?
I'd like to prepare the tea for my friends myself.
**Nanna:** I would be happy to show you! Let us make this a lovely little tea party.

veronica6.name: Veronica
veronica6.title: Royal Reception
veronica6.description: Imperial princess of the Emblian Empire. Hosts a tea party, acting as server, to deepen her ties with Askr, which she once was hostile toward.

Castle Hall: What a pleasant aroma. Tea calms the heart, soothes the nerves...and in time, brings tranquility.
I can't believe I'm here, drinking tea with...friends.
I am sorry I broke a cup... What? Don't be down? OK. I'll be more careful next time.
This outfit is lovely... I think I prefer it to what I usually wear.
I would like to have a tea party with my brother and sister someday. I wonder if they would enjoy my tea...
Visit:
I am Veronica, princess of Embla. This tea party invitation is from [F].
You will come, won't you?
Level: May this cup be a bridge that connects Embla and Askr.
If you would like more, just ask. I will get it for you.
I am sorry... Was it too hot?
Summon: I am Veronica, princess of Embla. I would be happy to develop Embla and Askr's bonds over some tea.
Learn Skill: I've learned how to brew a delicious cup of tea.
Confession:
I've thought of many ways the Emblian Empire and the Kingdom of Askr can deepen their bonds...
But now I know... Sitting face to face and enjoying tea together, in peace and warmth, is the simplest way.
Time spent this way builds trust, so bonds grow deeper...
I'm still not used to this, but... I wish for those who drink my tea to enjoy it. That would make me truly happy.
Status: Oh.
If you're having a tea party, I can serve...if you need help...
*gasp* *sigh* You almost made me spill the tea.
So many delicious-looking pastries...
There are so many sorts of teas... I like the ones with a pleasant aroma.
This outfit is so...cute. And fluttery too.
I wish I could have tea with Letizia and Bruno...like we used to...
Have a seat. I'll brew up one of my best teas for you.

finn2.name: Finn
finn2.title: Devoted Service
finn2.description: A devoted vassal who serves Leonster's royal family. Trading his trusty lance for a tea set, he puts his skills as server on display. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

Castle Hall: I would like to use this opportunity to gift Lord Leif a moment in which he can rest and enjoy a warm cup of tea.
I know the importance of taking time to appreciate tea. Lord Quan and Lady Ethlyn valued such moments.
If peace comes to the world, and I no longer have to fight, one thing I plan to enjoy is teatime with my daughter.
I am not used to such attire, but it would be boorish to don armor for tea. I shall endeavor to wear it well.
A cup of tea calms the nerves and gives one time to reflect. I would be pleased to aid in that pursuit.
Visit: I am Finn of Leonster. I bring with me some high-quality tea leaves sent to you by [F].
Level: How is the tea? I pray the time you spend sipping at it will be fruitful for you.
The path to proper tea cannot be traveled in a single day. I must devote myself to the practice.
Did I let my guard down?
Summon: I am Finn, a knight of Leonster. I am pleased to act as a server for all from the Order of Heroes this day.
Learn Skill: I shall strive to improve so that I never forget to consider others.
Confession:
I have spent my days fighting foes as a knight.
Now I'm learning how warmth and hospitality are essential to providing guests an enjoyable experience.
It is an attitude that shares similarities with the loyalty and service a retainer gives to their lord.
I must consider how I can make the guests smile, or what they might wish for, then make those things a reality.
It gives me an opportunity to grow as a person, not only as a knight. I am grateful to you for this experience.
Status: Aha.
I am uncertain if I am suited to be a server, but I will put forth my best effort.
Oh! Do be careful. If the tea spilled, it could burn someone.
I would like to ensure that Lord Leif is served the finest tea.
I believe my daughter would appreciate these beautiful sweets.
Taking time to enjoy tea can warm...even the depths of one's heart.
Lord Quan and Lady Ethlyn often conversed over tea...
It would please me if you tried a cup of the tea I have brewed.
